title: By the Queene. The Queenes Maiestie beyng desirous for certaine good considerations, to understande what shippes ... belongyng to the subiectes of her good brother the kyng of Spayne, are come to the handes of any of her subiectes ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Powles Churchyarde by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
notes: A proclamation ordering the declaration of goods seized from Spaniards.
At bottom of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regi√¶ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
